subject: Refactor source code
commitMessage:
Refactor source code

  - Modify soname for OpenGL ES 1.1 binary
  - Add all known pkg-config file names in Tizen Platform
  - Explicitly specify soname for the linker
  - Move .so file to release RPM
  - Apply .so file versioning
  - Add missing pkgconfig files for armv7l target
  - Upgrade OpenGL ES to version 3.1

Change-Id: I65a3cddc1debc918290e67f254cf021af928e997

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 1.
Patch Set 1: Code-Review+2 Verified+1
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

subject: Add pkg-config information for EGL

Add pkg-config information for EGL

Change-Id: I4129206127d9dd149ab813419d7ab8f4f4ea7f22
Signed-off-by: ≈Åukasz Stelmach <l.stelmach@samsung.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1:

This is an alternative change to Mesa's https://review.tizen.org/gerrit/10176 (although I think the patch for Mesa should be merged anyway). It enables this package to provide pkgconfig(egl) required, for example, by  webkit-efl.
Patch Set 1: Code-Review+1
Patch Set 1: Code-Review+1

(2 comments)

(2 comments)
